results.title: The evaluation of the effect of metformin on breast fibrocystic disease.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The present study showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is effective in treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocystic_Breast_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005348 @@@FCC@@@ and decreasing of clinical symptoms and imaging items.
